doc:
John Turturro https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Turturro 0 John Michael Turturro (; born February 28, 1957) is an Italian-American character actor, writer and filmmaker known for his roles in the films Do the Right Thing (1989), Miller's Crossing (1990), Barton Fink (1991), Quiz Show (1994), The Big Lebowski (1998), O Brother, Where Art Thou? (2000) and four entries in the Transformers film series, most recently The Last Knight (2017). He has appeared in over sixty films and has worked frequently with the Coen brothers, Adam Sandler and Spike Lee. An Emmy Award winner, Turturro has also been nominated for four Screen Actors Guild Awards and two Golden Globe Awards. John_Michael_Turturro ( ; born February_28_,_1957 ) is an_Italian-American_character_actor , writer_and_filmmaker known for his_roles in the_films Do the_Right_Thing ( 1989 ) , Miller 's_Crossing ( 1990 ) , Barton_Fink ( 1991 ) ,_Quiz_Show ( 1994 ) , The_Big_Lebowski ( 1998 ) , O_Brother , Where Art Thou ? (_2000_) and four_entries in the_Transformers_film_series , most_recently The_Last_Knight_(_2017_) . He has_appeared in over_sixty_films and has_worked frequently with the_Coen_brothers , Adam_Sandler and Spike_Lee . An_Emmy_Award_winner , Turturro has_also_been_nominated for four_Screen_Actors_Guild_Awards and two_Golden_Globe_Awards .
